Name: Station 228
About the game: History: 1488 year of a new era. Mankind has long conquered other planets. Station 228 was created, for the cultivation of homunculi on different planets, that homunculi would help people. But at one of the stations 228, all the grown up creatures started the uprising and the main character was just on the shift and he had to all be pacified with a crowbar on the head. It is necessary to leave the station and fly away from this place. You play for the big and strong guard of Ramses. Pick up the gun and go ahead. Features: -Sounding, classic shooter. - Puzzles - Very cool music - Classic Shooter - Various levels - Various opponents and different weapons
